Name: Born Fighter

Description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Mag -6 for 1 turn after combat.

Description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Spd -6 for 1 turn after combat.

Description: Grants Hit/Avo +30 when using an axe against lance users.

Name: Axebreaker+
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +30 when using a sword against axe users.

Name: Bowbreaker
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using magic against bow users.

Name: Fistbreaker
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a bow against brawlers.

Name: Tomebreaker
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when brawling against magic users.

Name: Model Leader
Description: Doubles experience earned for battalions.

Name: Defensive Tactics
Description: Battalion endurance takes half damage.

Name: Offensive Tactics
Description: Grants Mt +5 and Hit +20 with gambits.

Name: Fire
Description: Allows unit to cast Fire. If Fire is already available, then unit can cast it twice as often.

Name: Miasma Δ
Description: Allows unit to cast Miasma Δ. If Miasma Δ is already available, then unit can cast it twice as often.

Name: Heal
Description: Allows unit to cast Heal. If Heal is already available, then unit can cast it twice as often.

Name: Renewal
Description: Unit recovers up to 20% of max HP at the start of each turn.

Name: Catnap
Description: If unit takes no action except Wait, recovers up to 10% of max HP.

Name: Goody Basket
Description: Chance to recover up to 10% of max HP at the start of each turn. Trigger % = Lck stat.

Name: Songstress
Description: Adjacent allies recover up to 10% of max HP at the start of each turn.

Name: Hunter's Boon
Description: Grants Crit +20 when foe's HP is ? 50%.

Name: Poison Strike
Description: If unit initiates combat and lands a hit, targeted foe loses up to 20% of max HP after combat.

Name: Live to Serve
Description: When healing an ally with white magic, unit recovers the same amount of HP.

Name: Lifetaker
Description: Unit recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt after defeating a foe.

Name: Survival Instinct
Description: If unit initiates combat and defeats foe, grants Str/Mag/Dex/Spd +4 for one turn.

Name: Lethality
Description: Chance to instantly kill a foe when dealing damage. Trigger % = 0.25×Dex.

Name: Poison
Description: Chance to inflict poison on foe when dealing damage. Trigger % = Dex stat.

Name: Pavise
Description: Chance to reduce sword/lance/axe/brawling damage by half. Trigger % = Dex stat.

Name: Aegis
Description: Chance to reduce bow/magic damage by half. Trigger % = Dex stat.

Name: Miracle
Description: Chance to survive lethal damage with 1 HP, if HP is > 1. Trigger % = Lck stat.

Name: Terrain Resistance
Description: Nullifies damage from terrain.

Name: Special Dance
Description: When using the Dance ability, grant Dex/Spd/Lck +4 to target ally.

Name: Paragon
Description: Doubles experience earned.

Name: Professor's Guidance
Description: Multiplies this unit's and adjacent allies' experience earned by 1.2.

Name: Discipline
Description: Doubles skill experience earned in battle.

Name: Aptitude
Description: Makes each stat 20% more likely to increase on level up.

Name: Vantage
Description: When foe initiates combat, unit still attacks first if HP is ≤ 50%.

Name: Missing Number
Description: Missing Number (icon is based on Wary Fighter)

Name: Desperation
Description: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, unit's follow-up attack (if possible) occurs before foe's counterattack.

Name: Quick Riposte
Description: If foe initiates combat while unit's HP is ≥ 50%, unit makes guaranteed follow-up attack.

Name: Wrath
Description: If foe initiates combat while unit's HP is ≤ 50%, grants Crit +50.

Name: Dance
Description: Use Dance to allow an ally to move again.

Name: Steal
Description: Allows unit to steal a non-weapon item from a foe with a lower Spd stat.

Name: Locktouch
Description: Allows unit to open doors and chests without keys.

Name: Stealth
Description: Makes it more difficult for foes to target unit.

Name: Canto
Description: Allows unit to move again after completing certain actions, if there is movement remaining.

Name: Pass
Description: Allows unit to pass through spaces occupied by foes.

Name: Swordbreaker
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a lance against sword users.

Name: Lancebreaker
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using an axe against lance users.

Name: Bowrange +1
Description: Increases bow range by 1.

Name: Bowrange +2
Description: Increases bow range by 2.

Name: Black Magic Range +1
Description: Increases black magic range by 1.

Name: Dark Magic Range +1
Description: Increases dark magic range by 1.

Name: White Magic Range +1
Description: Increases white magic range by 1 for attacks that damage foes.

Name: Unarmed Combat
Description: Allows unit to fight without a weapon.

Name: Black Magic Uses x2
Description: Doubles the number of uses for black magic.

Name: Dark Magic Uses x2
Description: Doubles the number of uses for dark magic.

Name: White Magic Uses x2
Description: Doubles the number of uses for white magic.

Name: White Magic Heal +5
Description: Heal 5 extra HP when using white magic.

Name: White Magic Heal +10
Description: Heal 10 extra HP when using white magic.

Name: Weight -3
Description: Reduces total equipment weight by 3.

Name: Weight -5
Description: Reduces total equipment weight by 5.

Name: Axebreaker
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a sword against axe users.

Name: Unsealable Magic
Description: Prevents unit from being silenced.

Name: Immune Status
Description: Nullifies status effects and debuffs.

Name: General
Description: Nullifies instant death effects and halves damage from enemy gambits.

Name: Commander
Description: Nullifies instant death effects, status effects, and movement effects, and greatly reduces damage from enemy gambits.

Name: Infinite Magic
Description: Removes the limitation on the number of times magic can be used.

Name: Magic Bind
Description: If unit lands a hit, targeted foe is unable to use magic for 1 turn.

Name: Infantry Effect Null
Description: Cancels effectiveness against infantry units.

Name: Armored Effect Null
Description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against armored units.

Name: Cavalry Effect Null
Description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against cavalry units.

Name: Flying Effect Null
Description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against fliers.

Name: Dragon Effect Null
Description: Cancels effectiveness against dragons.

Name: Monster Effect Null
Description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against monsters.

Name: Effect Null
Description: Cancels all types of effectiveness.

Name: Air of Intimidation
Description: On Hold

Name: Vital Defense
Description: Makes critical hits against this unit impossible.

Name: Giant Wings
Description: Grants Avo +30 against sword, lance, or axe users.

Name: Anti-Magic Armor
Description: Nullifies damage from magic attacks.

Name: Divine Dragon Horn
Description: Unit recovers 100% of HP at the start of each turn if a White Beast is within 10 spaces.

Name: Path of the Conqueror
Description: On Hold

Name: Noncombatant
Description: Unit cannot be targeted by foes.

Name: Battalion Desperation
Description: If unit initiates combat when battalion endurance is ≤ 1/3, unit's follow-up attack (if possible) occurs before foe's counterattack.

Name: Cursed Power
Description: Unit recovers HP on swamp terrain.

Name: Anchor
Description: Prevents unit from being moved.

Name: Counterattack
Description: Allows unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Name: Twin Crests
Description: Allows unit to take two actions in one turn.

Name: Ancient Dragon Wrath
Description: Calculates damage using the lower of foe's Prt or Rsl.

Name: Surging Light
Description: Performs Staggering Blow immediately.

Name: Ancient Dragonskin
Description: Halves all damage taken, negates some abilities and combat arts, and prevents unit from being moved.

Name: Keen Intuition
Description: Grants Avo +30 during combat with a foe 2 or more spaces away.

Name: Staunch Shield
Description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Def +4 for 1 turn.

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: Unit deals 5 extra damage when no battalion is assigned or when battalion endurance is 0.

Name: Fighting Spirit
Description: Unit takes 5 less damage when no battalion is assigned or when battalion endurance is 0.

Name: Confidence
Description: Grants Hit/Avo +15 when unit is at full HP.

Name: Persecution Complex
Description: Grants Atk +5 when unit is not at full HP.

Name: Animal Friend
Description: Unit recovers up to 20% of max HP at the start of each turn when adjacent to a cavalry or flying ally.

Name: Perseverance
Description: Use Rally to grant Str +4 to an ally.

Name: Crest Scholar
Description: Use Rally to grant Mag +4 to an ally.

Name: Compassion
Description: Use Rally to grant Lck +8 to an ally.

Name: Lockpick
Description: Allows unit to open doors and chests without keys.

Name: Battalion Vantage
Description: When foe initiates combat, unit still attacks first if battalion endurance is ≤ 1/3.

Name: Battalion Wrath
Description: If foe initiates combat while unit's battalion endurance is ≤ 1/3, grants Crit +50.

Name: Battalion Renewal
Description: Unit recovers up to 30% of max HP at the start of each turn while battalion endurance is ≤ 1/3.

Name: Black Magic Uses Up+
Description: Quadruples the number of uses for black magic.

Name: Dark Magic Uses x4
Description: Quadruples the number of uses for dark magic.

Name: White Magic Uses Up+
Description: Quadruples the number of uses for white magic.

Name: Mighty King of Legend
Description: Negates 1 attack per turn and strengthens stats while the 10 Elites are present.

Name: 10 Elites
Description: Grants power to the Mighty King of Legend.

Name: Alert Stance
Description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +15 for 1 turn.

Name: Alert Stance+
Description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +30 for 1 turn.

Name: Close Counter
Description: Allows unit to counterattack adjacent foes.

Name: Professor's Guidance+
Description: Unit deals 2 extra damage during combat. Multiplies this unit's and adjacent allies' experience earned by 1.2.

Name: Imperial Lineage+
Description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Res +4 for 1 turn. Multiplies experience earned by 1.2.

Name: Royal Lineage+
Description: Grants Avo +20 while unit is at full HP. Multiplies experience earned by 1.2.

Name: Leicester Lineage+
Description: Allows unit to pass through spaces occupied by foes. Multiplies experience earned by 1.2.

Name: Murderous Intent
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit +20 during combat.

Name: Sacred Power
Description: Adjacent allies deal 3 extra damage and take 3 less damage during combat.

Name: Agarthan Technology
Description: Adjacent foes deal 3 less damage during combat.

Name: Blade Breaker
Description: If unit damages foe, foe suffers Str/Def -6 for 1 turn after combat.

Name: Lucky Seven
Description: Each turn, grants +5 to one of the following stats: Str, Mag, Spd, Def, Res, Hit, or Avo.

Name: Transmute
Description: If unit is hit with a magic attack during enemy phase, grants +3 to all stats until next player phase ends.

Name: Honorable Spirit
Description: If unit is not near an ally, grants Atk +3 when in combat with a foe one space away.

Name: King of Grappling
Description: Grants Str/Def +6 when HP is <=50%.

Name: Circadian Beat
Description: Grants Str/Mag +3 when indoors and Def/Res +3 when outdoors.

Name: Monstrous Appeal
Description: Makes all attacks effective against monsters and makes it easier for monsters to target unit.

Name: Business Prosperity
Description: Grants Lck +5.

Name: Umbral Leech
Description: Unit absorbs HP from phantoms.

Name: Manifest Phantom
Description: Unit births phantoms.

Name: Enhanced Fortitude
Description: Halves all damage taken, negates some abilities and combat arts, and prevents unit from being moved.

Name: Duelist's Blow
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Avo +20 during combat.

Name: Uncanny Blow
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit +30 during combat.
